entry.title: djoyner/hap-probe-rrd-writer
entry.summary:
Back-end RRD writer for time-series power usage and environmental data collected from distributed wireless probes.

Overview

Back-end RRD writer for time-series power usage and environmental data collected from distributed wireless probes.

The writer sources JSON-formatted data from a ZeroMQ SUB socket connected to an instance of a hap-probe-collector. As data messages arrive they are decoded and probe sources are identified via hardware address. Individual data points are written to RRD files using direct librrd FFI calls.

Probe addresses and mappings to RRD data sources (DS) and round-robin archives (RRA) are fully specified in an external config file.

Author

David Joyner, david@joynerhome.net
